welcome_message_body: Welcome to Clichy-sous-Bois, a charming city with a rich history and vibrant culture. Known for its beautiful parks and lively markets, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, mainly used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
